div.a: Texas schools will be closed to the public for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year

div.div: Governor Abbott announced on April 17, 2020 that Texas schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. A committee is already being forme...Read more...

div.a: Head Start Applications for 2020-2021 School Year

div.div: Head Start will be taking applications for the 2020-2021 school year starting March 16 th May 29 th . Please call 903-569-0165 to schedule an appointment.Read more...

div.a: Mineola ISD - We've Got an App for That!

div.div: Mineola ISD has launched a new district mobile app to offer you even better on-the-go access to all things Mineola ISD. The new app, powered by EZ Task, offers ...Read more...
